sense.def:
Kadar je neka oseba ali stvar
without something
, nečesa nima.

seg.quote: ...city slums without lights, roads or water.
She was without an ambition in the world.

sense.def:
Kadar storimo eno stvar
without doing another
, druge stvari ne storimo.

seg.quote: They drove into town without talking to each other.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj storimo
without a particular feeling
, nimamo določenega čustva, ko tisto storimo.

Kadar se ena stvar zgodi
without another thing happening
, se druga stvar ne zgodi.

seg.quote: The rest of the press conference passed without incident.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj storimo
without someone
, pri tem nimamo družbe ali pomoči določene osebe.

seg.quote: Her husband felt he couldn't face life without her.
